components.description:
A bar of soap, as used in the shower, bath or for hand washing. Generally shown with lathered bubbles. Depicted in various colors, often pink, and at different angles.

Commonly used for various content concerning bathing, washing, and cleaning. May be used to represent the opposite of dirt or being dirty. Recommended for use to prevent the spread of COVID-19.
components.title: Bar of Soap

title: Bar of Soap

version.description:
Unicode 11.0 was released on June 5, 2018. Emojis that require new code points for release are listed on this page but for the full 2018 emoji list see Emoji 11.0.

Emoji 11.0 includes every new emoji, including variations for skin tone, gender and new emojis that don't require additional code points, such as the chess pawn or pirate flag which are not shown on this page.

apple_vendor_description: The soap emoji on Apple devices presents a smooth, rounded bar with gentle, translucent shading that suggests a hint of moisture. Its soft, pastel blue color and subtle highlights evoke a feeling of freshness and cleanliness, characteristic of Apple's clean aesthetic. This emoji is often used to signify hygiene, washing up, or a fresh start in digital conversations.
